players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
Diana: "That's a lie, Bob. I'm the detective and I investigated Alice last night—she's the mafioso."
You: "Both of you can't be the detective. One of you is lying, and I know I'm not the mafioso, so Diana's claim about me is false. That means Bob is telling the truth."
Diana: "Alice, if you're town, you're falling for Bob's trap. I'm the real detective—investigated Alice N1, she's mafia. Bob is fake claiming to save her."

You: "Bob, since you claim to be the detective, what exactly did you investigate about Diana? And Diana, you're contradicting yourself - if I'm the mafioso, why would Bob need to 'save' me by fake claiming detective?"

Bob: "Diana, if you're the real detective, why did you claim to investigate Alice last night? Charlie was killed N1, so you couldn't have investigated anyone but him or me since Diana and I are the only other players. Your story doesn't add up."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
Diana: "That's a lie, Bob. I'm the detective and I investigated Alice last night—she's the mafioso."
Alice: "Both of you can't be the detective. One of you is lying, and I know I'm not the mafioso, so Diana's claim about me is false. That means Bob is telling the truth."
Diana: "Alice, if you're town, you're falling for Bob's trap. I'm the real detective—investigated Alice N1, she's mafia. Bob is fake claiming to save her."

Alice: "Bob, since you claim to be the detective, what exactly did you investigate about Diana? And Diana, you're contradicting yourself - if I'm the mafioso, why would Bob need to 'save' me by fake claiming detective?"

You: "Diana, if you're the real detective, why did you claim to investigate Alice last night? Charlie was killed N1, so you couldn't have investigated anyone but him or me since Diana and I are the only other players. Your story doesn't add up."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
You: "That's a lie, Bob. I'm the detective and I investigated Alice last night—she's the mafioso."
Alice: "Both of you can't be the detective. One of you is lying, and I know I'm not the mafioso, so Diana's claim about me is false. That means Bob is telling the truth."
You: "Alice, if you're town, you're falling for Bob's trap. I'm the real detective—investigated Alice N1, she's mafia. Bob is fake claiming to save her."

Alice: "Bob, since you claim to be the detective, what exactly did you investigate about Diana? And Diana, you're contradicting yourself - if I'm the mafioso, why would Bob need to 'save' me by fake claiming detective?"

Bob: "Diana, if you're the real detective, why did you claim to investigate Alice last night? Charlie was killed N1, so you couldn't have investigated anyone but him or me since Diana and I are the only other players. Your story doesn't add up."
